    public class ClosingAwareWebDriverWrapper
extends WebDriverWrapper
implements ClosingAwareWebDriver
    WebDriver wrapper implementing ClosingAwareWebDriver interface.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClosingAwareWebDriverWrapper

        public ClosingAwareWebDriverWrapper(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver,
                                    FrameSwitcher frameSwitcher,
                                    boolean maximize,
                                    boolean reusable,
                                    boolean mobile)
        Constructs ClosingAwareWebDriver.
        Parameters:
        driver - WebDriver to be wrapped by ClosingAwareWebDriver
        frameSwitcher - FrameSwitcher instance
        maximize - should the browser be maximized during reset (affects reusable mode)
        reusable - overrides behavior of close() and quit() methods. If the browser is reusable the cookies for current domain will be deleted and browser will navigate to about:blank page instead of terminating the process.
        mobile - denotes mobile web driver. Mobile web drivers do not support alert checking.
